column.name: approve_task_name
column.text: 记录审批时的节点名称

column.name: approve_task_candidate_user_ids
column.text: 记录审批任务时，候选的审批用户（例如，驳回时，需要使用此字段)

column.name: reject_to_choose_node_task_key
column.text: 当用户驳回到选择节点时，该属性值就是用户选择的节点key

column.name: reject_re_run_complete_status
column.text: （分级）驳回后是否已归位再往下走的状态：1=已归位

column.name: approve_result
column.text: 审批动作(文本值:同意、退回字样)

column.name: variables_json
column.text: 记录审批任务的流程变量Map 的JSON表示

statements.statement:
select * from ext_approve_opinion where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( definition_name like '%${key}%' or task_key like '%${key}%' or approve_result like '%${key}%' or approve_opinion like '%${key}%' or approve_user_name like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.idNotIn??> and id not in(${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.idNotIn)}) </#if>
<#if query.businessKey??> and business_key = '${query.businessKey}' </#if>
<#if query.processInstanceId??> and process_instance_id = '${query.processInstanceId}' </#if>
<#if query.definitionId??> and definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.definitionId)}' </#if>
<#if query.definitionKey??> and definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.definitionKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.definitionName??> and definition_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.definitionName)}' </#if>
<#if query.taskId??> and approve_task_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveTaskId)}' </#if>
<#if query.approveTaskKey??> and approve_task_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveTaskKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.rejectReRunCompleteStatus??> and reject_re_run_complete_status = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.rejectReRunCompleteStatus)}' </#if>
<#if query.approveResult??> and approve_result = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveResult)}' </#if>
<#if query.approveAction??> and approve_action = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveAction)}' </#if>
<#if query.approveOpinion??> and approve_opinion = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveOpinion)}' </#if>
<#if query.approveUserId??> and approve_user_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveUserId)}' </#if>
<#if query.approveUserName??> and approve_user_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.approveUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#-- 去除加签、转发、抄送意见 --> <#if query.approveActionListNotIn?? && (query.approveActionListNotIn?size>0)> and approve_action not in ( <#list query.approveActionListNotIn as approveAction> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(approveAction)}' <#if approveAction_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.sortOrder?? && query.sortField??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} </#if>
<#if query.limit??> limit ${query.limit} </#if> </#if>
select distinct approve_task_key ,approve_task_name from ext_approve_opinion where 1=1 and process_instance_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(processInstanceId)}' and approve_action!='start'
